11 #define VERSION "0.0.0"

14 QByteArray readFile(QString filename)
15 {
16  QFile file(filename);
17  if (!file.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly)) return QByteArray();
18  QByteArray blob = file.readAll();
19  return blob;
20 }
21 
22 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
23 {
24  QCoreApplication app(argc, argv);
25 
26  QCoreApplication::setOrganizationName("Parallax Inc.");
27  QCoreApplication::setOrganizationDomain("www.parallax.com");
28  QCoreApplication::setApplicationVersion(VERSION);
29  QCoreApplication::setApplicationName(QObject::tr("Propeller Manager CLI"));
30 
31  QCommandLineParser parser;
32  parser.addHelpOption();
33  parser.addVersionOption();
34  parser.setApplicationDescription(
35  QObject::tr("\nA command-line wrapper to the Propeller Manager API"
36  "\nCopyright 2015 by %1").arg(QCoreApplication::organizationName()));
37 
38  QCommandLineOption argList( QStringList() << "l" << "list", QObject::tr("List available devices"));
39  QCommandLineOption argWrite( QStringList() << "w" << "write", QObject::tr("Write program to EEPROM"));
40  QCommandLineOption argDevice( QStringList() << "d" << "device",QObject::tr("Device to program (default: first system device)"), "DEV");
41  QCommandLineOption argPin( QStringList() << "p" << "pin", QObject::tr("Pin for GPIO reset"), "PIN");
42  QCommandLineOption argTerm( QStringList() << "t" << "terminal", QObject::tr("Drop into terminal after download"));
43  QCommandLineOption argIdentify( QStringList() << "i" << "identify", QObject::tr("Identify device connected at port"));
44 
45  parser.addOption(argList);
46  parser.addOption(argWrite);
47  parser.addOption(argDevice);
48  parser.addOption(argPin);
49  parser.addOption(argTerm);
50  parser.addOption(argIdentify);
51 
52  parser.addPositionalArgument("file", QObject::tr("Binary file to download"), "FILE");
53 
54  parser.process(app);
55 
56  QStringList device_list = Loader::list_devices();
57  if (parser.isSet(argList))
58  {
59  for (int i = 0; i < device_list.size(); i++)
60  {
61  qDebug() << qPrintable(device_list[i]);
62  }
63  return 0;
64  }
65 
66  if (device_list.isEmpty())
67  {
68  qDebug() << "No devices available for download!";
69  return 1;
70  }
71 
72  QString device = device_list[0];
73  if (!parser.value(argDevice).isEmpty())
74  {
75  device = parser.value(argDevice);
76  if (!device_list.contains(device))
77  {
78  qDebug() << "Device name not available";
79  return 1;
80  }
81  }
82 
83 #if defined(Q_PROCESSOR_ARM_V6) && defined(Q_OS_LINUX)
84  int reset_pin = 17;
85 #else
86  int reset_pin = -1;
87 #endif
88 
89  if (!parser.value(argPin).isEmpty())
90  {
91  reset_pin = parser.value(argPin).toInt();
92  }
93  if (reset_pin > -1)
94  qDebug() << "Using GPIO pin" << reset_pin << "for hardware reset";
95 
96 
97  if (parser.isSet(argIdentify))
98  {
99  foreach (QString d, device_list)
100  {
101  Loader loader(d,reset_pin);
102  loader.open();
103 
104  switch (loader.get_version())
105  {
106  case 1:
107  qDebug("[ %-16s ] %s", qPrintable(d), "Propeller P8X32A");
108  break;
109  case 0:
110  default:
111  qDebug("[ %-16s ] %-9s",qPrintable(d), "NOT FOUND");
112  break;
113  }
114 
115  loader.close();
116  }
117  }
118  else
119  {
120  Loader loader(device,reset_pin);
121  if (loader.open())
122  return 1;
123 
124  if (parser.positionalArguments().isEmpty())
125  {
126  qDebug() << "Error: Must provide name of binary";
127  return 1;
128  }
129 
130  if (!parser.positionalArguments()[0].contains("*.binary$"))
131  {
132  loader.upload_binary(readFile(parser.positionalArguments()[0]),parser.isSet(argWrite));
133  }
134  else
135  {
136  qDebug() << "Invalid file specified";
137  }
138 
139  if (parser.isSet(argTerm))
140  loader.terminal();
141 
142  loader.close();
143  }
144 
145  return 0;
146 }
